Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Mary:
For the Commemoration of St. Mary during the Raising of Morning Incense:

Text.Language: Niourwou t/rou n~te p~kahi: cemosi qen peouwini: ouoh nieynoc qen peviri: w~ Maria y~mau m~V].
All the kings of the earth / walk in your light / and all nations in your illumination / O Mary, Mother of God.

Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Mary during the Raising of Evening Incense:

Text.Language: A oum/s n~c~himi [itaio: a~re[ici n~yo e~hoterwou t/rou: je n~yo pe p~sousou n~niparyenoc: ]yeo~tokoc Maria.
Many women received honor, you are exalted more than all of them, for you are the pride of the virgins, Mother of God Mary.
